Blade.Description: The blade is a crucial component of a wind turbine, responsible for capturing the kinetic energy of the wind and converting it into rotational energy.
The blade is connected to the rotor hub, which transfers the rotational energy from the blade to the main shaft of the wind turbine.
The pitch system adjusts the angle of the blade to optimize the efficiency of the wind turbine and protect it from extreme wind conditions.
